collection:
This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share
information about you when you use our services.
User-Provided Information: We collect your email address when you sign up for our services.
API Data: When you use our APIs (e.g., calendar, contacts, tasks), we may collect data you provide through these APIs.
Our APIs also collect anonymous feedback for improvement purposes.
